mapper.sql: id, origin_id, nickname, app_id, user_id, create_time, chatbot_name , head_img_url , verify_type_info
mapper.select:
select
from e_wx_pub order by create_time desc limit #{startIndex,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{pageSize,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.insert: insert into e_wx_pub ( id, origin_id, nickname, app_id, user_id, create_time, chatbot_name , head_img_url , verify_type_info) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{chatbotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{verifyTypeInfo,jdbcType=INTEGER} )

insert into e_wx_pub
id,
origin_id,
nickname,
app_id,
user_id,
create_time,
chatbot_name,
head_img_url,
verify_type_info,

mapper.update:
update e_wx_pub
origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
chatbot_name = #{chatbotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
head_img_url = #{chatbotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
verify_type_info = #{verifyTypeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update e_wx_pub set origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chatbot_name = #{chatbotName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, verify_type_info = #{verifyTypeInfo,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}

update e_wx_pub set origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, nickname = #{nickname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, app_id = #{appId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, user_id = #{userId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, chatbot_name = #{chatbotName}, head_img_url = #{headImgUrl}, verify_type_info = #{verifyTypeInfo} where origin_id = #{originId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select:
select
from e_wx_pub where user_id = #{userId}
and nickname like '%${wxPubNickname}%'
order by create_time desc

SELECT e.id, e.origin_id, e.nickname, e.app_id, e.user_id, e.create_time, e.chatbot_name , e.head_img_url , e.verify_type_info FROM e_wx_pub e JOIN r_wx_pub_tag r ON e.id = r.wx_pub_id where r.tag_id = #{tagId}
